title: If 2 people with a leaverbuster duo what would happen?
body: so me and my friend have a leaverbuster, what would happen if we duo'd together. Would it be only 20 minutes or 40 minutes

replies.body:
If you two queued up together while having an LPQ, the world would turn into goat cheese and every person would turn into a cup of room-temperature tea! D:

*Just kidding!* What would actually happen is that you would both work down your *Low-priority queue* together. Each match you played together and didn't AFK in would count towards working down those penalties.

I hope this helped! Hit me up if you have any other questions. ^.^
